comment.author: Matthew
comment.text: I'm starting to lean Stein. Clinton must denounce the DAPL and the actions taken against the peaceful Water Defenders to be considered. #NoDAPL

replies.author: Kristin
replies.text: Trump wants clean water..clean coal...research...3rd Party vote is like voting Hillary...you can Google what Jill Stein has said of Trump...not telling you who to vote for...just informing...this election is so important
